Package com.google.auto.value.extension.serializable

Annotation Interface SerializableAutoValue

@Retention(SOURCE) @Target(TYPE) public @interface SerializableAutoValue
Annotates @AutoValue classes that implement Serializable. A serializable subclass is generated for classes with normally un-serializable fields like Optional.
